item.title: Databricks confirms new $100B valuation on $4B ARR
item.description: Just months after raising a whopping $10 billion, Databricks has confirmed another $1 billion raise at a $100 billion valuation.

item.title: YouTube’s first exclusive NFL broadcast attracts over 17M viewers
item.description: Over 17.3 million viewers tuned in for YouTube's first-ever exclusive global broadcast of an NFL game with the Chiefs and Chargers.

item.title: Y Combinator-backed Motion raises fresh $38M to build the Microsoft Office of AI agents
item.description: In his early 20s, Harry Qi left a million-year hedge fund job to join Y Combinator. His SMB AI agent startup is now growing fast.

item.title: Spotify’s new ‘smart filters’ let you screen library content by activity, genre or mood
item.description: Spotify is launching a new feature that allows users to filter their library by specific activities, moods, or genres. These filters can also be used ...

item.title: Adtech company PubMatic sues Google over monopoly violations
